overview:
Justin Miller is the President and CEO of Plaxo. Justin had previously been serving as the General Manager of Plaxo.com.

Justin is a business and product leader with unwavering focus on great user experience. He joined Plaxo from Move, where he was the Senior Vice President of Product Management and Design and led the complete redesign of the Realtor.com and Move.com websites.

Before Move, he was at eBay, where he led their European Product organization, and before that, led eBayâ€™s global User Experience Design organization, a group of over 150 people in over 25 countries, responsible for the user experience of all sites in all eBay countries. Considered one of eBayâ€™s “User Experience Champions,” Miller played an integral role in improving user experience on a global level.

Prior to eBay, Miller led the user interface team at the Webvan Group where he started and led their product management and UI groups. Prior to that, Miller led human interface design efforts for Net Explorer and served as a leader of human interface designs at Apple Computer.

Justin earned a Masters Degree in Human Computer Interaction from Rice University and a B.A. in Psychology from Rutgers University.
